message: Good day Bob, I'm delighted to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm sure you'll find our price of $1400000 quite reasonable.
Alice, I appreciate your offer. However, considering all factors, I propose purchasing the product for $1200000. Please let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I'm afraid I can't accept your proposed price. However, I'm willing to reevaluate my initial offer and propose a new price of $1300000. I believe this adjusted price better reflects the value of the product, and I hope we can move forward with this new figure.
